document.full_text: greek borrowing costs soared to new highs on thursday and pressure rose on other financially weak euro zone countries after germany suggested for the first time that athens may have to restructure its large debt load.
document.title: euro zone hit by greek restructuring concerns
lines_and_colors: greek borrowing costs soared to new highs on thursday and pressure rose on other financially weak euro zone countries after germany suggested for the first time that athens may have to restructure its large debt load.
